Ireland: Palladius is sent as the first bishop "to the Irish believing in Christ" by Pope Celestine I
Cyprus: The Church of Cyprus achieved its independence from the Patriarch of Antioch at the First Council of Ephesus.
China: The Western Qin prince Qifu Mumo was executed along with his nobility by the Xia emperor Helian Ding.
Helian Ding was captured by the khan of Tuyuhun.
Belgium: Salian Franks take possession of Tournai.
